message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $90. Can you meet me at $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I can do $99, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $99, but I'm still a bit above $95. Can you meet me at $95?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $98, Bob. I think we're close to a deal, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $95?
